summary: REQ-48 appears implemented by defaulting the Profile Setup language to Dutch while still allowing manual changes. REQ-47 is partially implemented by adding a NextThemes ThemeProvider with system theme support and CSS variables for dark mode, but the diff does not show any changes to the header theme dropdown to ensure it actually toggles Light/Dark/System across the app.

missing_requirements.requirement: Using the header theme dropdown (Light/Dark/System) immediately updates the UI colors across all screens (login, profile setup, assistant dashboard, manager dashboard, to-do).
missing_requirements.reason: The app is wrapped in a next-themes ThemeProvider, but the diff summary includes no evidence of implementing or wiring the header dropdown to call next-themes (e.g., setTheme) so that selecting Light/Dark/System updates the UI.

hallucinated_features.description: Defensive role-based rendering with an explicit "unknown role" fallback UI.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses only on dark mode behavior and default profile language; adding new role-fallback behavior is not requested.
